title: Dark Wolverine, Volume 1: The Prince
description: Wolverine's son, Daken, has finally emerged from the shadows, stepping out onto the main stage of the Marvel Universe. As one of Norman Osborne's Avengers, he has power, access, and an identity that he hates - his father's. This new Wolverine doesn't know how long this will last, but one thing's for sure: He's going to have some fun while it does.Collecting: Dark Wolverine 75-77, material from Wolverine 73-74
author: Daniel Way
